## IPinotQueryOptions.inPredicateLookupAlgorithm property

Algorithm to use to look up the dictionary ids for the IN clause values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
inPredicateLookupAlgorithm?: 'DIVIDE_BINARY_SEARCH' | 'SCAN' | 'PLAIN_BINARY_SEARCH';
```
